rows.label: qst720303_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, Kei!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0002
rows.name: Kai-niichan!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0003
rows.name: I'm so glad. We finally found you.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0004
rows.name: Yeah, thanks.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't you go losing your younger sister
again. You're the older brother,
after all.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0006
rows.name: Yeah, I'll be careful.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0007
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Look at Hikari...
making a nice face for once.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0008
rows.name:
Hey, Kai-niichan.
I've been holding onto this,
the thing you left behind.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0010
rows.name: Oh, I thought I lost this! Thanks.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] It's similar...
to the memento of Laura's mother...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0012
rows.name: H-hey...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0013
rows.name: Can I see that for a second?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0014
rows.name: Sure!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0016
rows.name: Where did you get this?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0017
rows.name: I got it from Auntie Rynea!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0019
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] So it really was... from Mom...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0020
rows.name:
You know, Kai-niichan really wanted
the one the auntie had.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0021
rows.name:
But Auntie said it was something
really precious to her...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0022
rows.name:
So she made a similar
one for him instead.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0023
rows.name:
Auntie said she was sorry she
couldn't make it any better.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0024
rows.name:
That doesn't matter.
She made this for me.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0025
rows.name: So this is my treasure!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0026
rows.name: I see... Take good care of it.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0027
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0028
rows.name:
...Huh? For a second, the way
you said that, Nee-chan,
sounded a lot like Auntie Rynea.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0029
rows.name: It really did.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0030
rows.name: Fufu, maybe so...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0031
rows.name:
Everyone, I'm sure you have a lot
to catch up on, but I have a suggestion
for what to do with these siblings.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0032
rows.name: For us?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0033
rows.name:
That's right. This flagship will be
returning to Superbia before long.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0034
rows.name:
How would you two like to come
with us to Superbia?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0035
rows.name:
That's a good idea.
The situation in Superbia is stable,
after all.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0036
rows.name: Superbia, huh...?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0037
rows.name: No! I promised Dad!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0038
rows.name:
I promised I'd wait here for him
to come back! So I'm
not leaving Gula!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0039
rows.name: That's right, I forgot...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0040
rows.name:
Um, thanks for the offer to take us
to Superbia, but... sorry. We're going
to wait for our dad at the camp.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0041
rows.name: Understood. We won't force you.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0042
rows.name:
Yeah. It'd be a problem if you missed
each other because you
moved from this spot.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0043
rows.name:
We'll leave some food for you.
Please be careful.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0044
rows.name: Yeah! Thanks for everything!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0045
rows.name: Messenger! Messenger!

rows.label: qst720303_msg0046
rows.name: Is it urgent?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0047
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0048
rows.name:
I have urgent information
for His Majesty...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0049
rows.name: Let's hear it.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0051
rows.name: Is that so...

rows.label: qst720303_msg0052
rows.name:
Everyone, could you please gather
in the strategy room on the ship later?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0053
rows.name: Did something unexpected happen?

rows.label: qst720303_msg0054
rows.name: Yes... I'll explain inside.
